title: Best Google Pixel 9a cases
description: Protect your Google Pixel 9a with these amazing cases. The post Best Google Pixel 9a cases appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Ajit Singh
excerpt: Protect your Google Pixel 9a with these amazing cases.
text: Google has officially debuted its new affordable smartphone Pixel 9a. It comes with a relatively bigger 6.3-inch OLED display. There is the new Tensor G4 processor with 8GB RAM and up to 256GB storage. The dual rear camera setup features 48MP and 13MP sensors. The smartphone has glass on the front, plastic on the back, and aluminum frames. It further boasts an IP68 rating for dust and water resistance but if you want complete peace of mind, do invest in a high-quality protective case. Check out these best Google Pixel 9a cases you can grab. Spigen Liquid Air Case This is a TPU case with a unique matte textured design for an anti-slip grip. It has raised edges for camera and display protection. Air Cushion Technology helps with shock absorption. This case is compatible with wireless charging. Choose from four different colors. Spigen Crystal Clear Case It is a completely clear/transparent smartphone case. It is infused with blue raisins for long-lasting clarity. It offers complete protection from drops and also prevents camera and display. Wireless charging compatibility is here. Spigen Rugged Armor MagFit Case This flexible TPU case has a spider-web pattern on the inside and carbon fiber accents. It offers tactile buttons, comfortable grip, and support for wireless charging. Available in Matte Black color. Ringke Fusion Clear Case It is a shockproof bumper case with a transparent back. This case offers precise cutouts for buttons and ports. It boasts long-lasting transparency as compared to other clear cases. You get built-in strap holes to attach wrist straps and other accessories. Wireless charging support is available. Ringke Onyx Case This case comes with a unique anti-fingerprint texture. It helps keep oil smudges away. Built-in magnets help with wireless charging. You get an improved grip experience with the micro-dot embossing pattern. Sale FNTCASE Rugged Bumper Case This is a rugged smartphone case with soft TPU inner and hard PC outer shell. The back has a slip-proof texture design on the side and back. You get raised edges for camera and display protection. Precise cutouts and tactile buttons are also present. html:
Google has officially debuted its new affordable smartphone Pixel 9a. It comes with a relatively bigger 6.3-inch OLED display. There is the new Tensor G4 processor with 8GB RAM and up to 256GB storage. The dual rear camera setup features 48MP and 13MP sensors.

The smartphone has glass on the front, plastic on the back, and aluminum frames. It further boasts an IP68 rating for dust and water resistance but if you want complete peace of mind, do invest in a high-quality protective case. Check out these best Google Pixel 9a cases you can grab.

Spigen Liquid Air Case

This is a TPU case with a unique matte textured design for an anti-slip grip. It has raised edges for camera and display protection. Air Cushion Technology helps with shock absorption. This case is compatible with wireless charging. Choose from four different colors.

Spigen Crystal Clear Case

It is a completely clear/transparent smartphone case. It is infused with blue raisins for long-lasting clarity. It offers complete protection from drops and also prevents camera and display. Wireless charging compatibility is here.

Spigen Rugged Armor MagFit Case

This flexible TPU case has a spider-web pattern on the inside and carbon fiber accents. It offers tactile buttons, comfortable grip, and support for wireless charging. Available in Matte Black color.

Ringke Fusion Clear Case

It is a shockproof bumper case with a transparent back. This case offers precise cutouts for buttons and ports. It boasts long-lasting transparency as compared to other clear cases. You get built-in strap holes to attach wrist straps and other accessories. Wireless charging support is available.

Ringke Onyx Case

This case comes with a unique anti-fingerprint texture. It helps keep oil smudges away. Built-in magnets help with wireless charging. You get an improved grip experience with the micro-dot embossing pattern.

Sale

FNTCASE Rugged Bumper Case

This is a rugged smartphone case with soft TPU inner and hard PC outer shell. The back has a slip-proof texture design on the side and back. You get raised edges for camera and display protection. Precise cutouts and tactile buttons are also present.
